Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1057.jpg'}
{1: 'Misono High', 2: 'Evening, April 2nd - Pleasant and Dry', 4: 'Music Room -  Second-Year Choir'}
{3: "—With deepest respect and gratitude for all you've done for me."}
{3: '—How many years have flown by since those days of school life...'}
{3: "—When we look back, we're surprised by how fast time went by..."}
{3: 'Plain curtains sway in the breeze as the evening sun casts its lingering rays across the polished wooden floor.'}
{3: 'A piano sits near the podium, with chairs neatly arranged in a circle around it.'}
{3: 'The second-year students are singing "Ode to Our Teachers" in unison, accompanied by the piano.'}
{3: 'In seven months, they will be performing the second verse at their graduation ceremony.'}
{3: 'With plenty of time ahead, they only practice during their regular music classes.'}
{3: 'As the final chorus comes to an end, the solemn atmosphere quickly gives way to relaxation.'}
{3: "Kishii, the class representative, calls out each student's name for attendance."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kishii', 3: 'Are you Sato, student number 14? Ah yes, please sign here.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She diligently takes notes, flipping back and forth through the attendance book.'}
{2: 'Kishii', 3: "Hold on, Emi. You can't head to volleyball practice until you've signed it.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Emi', 3: "Couldn't you just sign for me, Kishii?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kishii', 3: "Gee, you guys just can't be bothered, huh?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The classroom at dusk resonates with the laughter of students.'}
{3: 'After bidding farewell to the students on day duty, Kishii notices a girl packing her bag in the corner.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kishii', 3: "Yuka! Welcome back, it's been a while!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "Oh... yes, I'm sorry for any inconvenience I've caused, Kishii.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kishii', 3: 'No, no, not at all! Everyone in the class has really missed you.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kishii', 3: 'How have you been lately? Are you feeling any better?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "Well... I wouldn't say I'm better... but at least I can attend classes now.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kishii', 3: "I've kept your test papers for you. Come see me during class tomorrow to pick them up.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Thank you, Kishii.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kishii', 3: 'By the way, have you seen Yata around?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kishii', 3: "I know you two are close friends, so I thought I'd ask.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "Yata... she's at track team training. She probably forgot to ask for leave.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kishii', 3: "I see. I'll make a note of that.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kishii', 3: "Any new competitions coming up? Well, I'm sure the Track Queen of Misono will breeze through them anyway.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'I hope so. Yata always gives it her all during training.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kishii', 3: 'Oh, speaking of which...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'With a mischievous grin, Kishii pulls out a small poster from behind her back.'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "What's this?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kishii', 3: 'Take a look at this masterpiece I made!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Yuka furrows her brows as she stares at the crudely drawn watercolor poster.'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Misono... Horror Stories Club?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "There's no student council stamp on this. This isn't an officially recognized club, is it?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "Don't tell me you started this Horror Stories Club on your own, Kishii?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kishii', 3: 'Yup, you bet I did!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "But aren't you a student council member? Why would you...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kishii', 3: "It's only unofficial for the time being. Once we get four members, we'll submit a formal application.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kishii', 3: "We're still in the preparation phase, but we've already started doing some night explorations...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Night... explorations?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kishii', 3: 'Yuka, have you heard of the Seven Mysteries of Misono?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'No, not at all.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "I've never even heard any of them.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kishii', 3: 'Like the mysterious night fires in the science classroom...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kishii', 3: 'The crying girl in the bathroom...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kishii', 3: 'The running statue...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kishii', 3: 'Pretty exciting, right?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kishii', 3: 'The Horror Stories Club currently has three members—me and two senior girls.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kishii', 3: "At night, we sneak back to school to investigate supernatural occurrences. Sounds fun, doesn't it?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "Thanks for the invitation, Kishii, but I don't really think it's something I can handle.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kishii', 3: "Aw, that's too bad!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kishii', 3: "I haven't gotten any new members today... I've asked half the school already... Argh, my head is killing me!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Kishii slumps over the desk across from Yuka, occasionally casting pleading glances her way.'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'You can look at me all you want, but there is nothing I can do about that...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "Well, I should be on my way now. Thanks again for your help, and sorry I can't help!", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Yuka quickly picks up her schoolbag and walks straight towards the back door of the classroom.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kishii', 3: "Ah, wait... Yuka! You don't have to go exploring with us, but please, please join our club!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'By the time Kishii rushes out of the classroom, Yuka is already long gone.'}
{2: 'Kishii', 3: "Sigh, this really isn't my day...", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1052.jpg'}
{3: 'Meanwhile, on the running track at the other end of Misono High, the track and field club is training.'}
{3: 'The boys swing their arms with all their might, pushing forward on sheer willpower despite their exhaustion.'}
{3: 'Behind them, a nimble figure swiftly closes the gap.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Coach', 3: "You useless bunch! Getting outrun by a girl? You're a disgrace to this school!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'While the coach continues his tirade, that figure has already sprinted to the front of the pack, leaving everyone watching in awe.'}
{2: 'Coach', 3: "And you, Yata! Don't let a few compliments go to your head!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'Yeah, yeah, keep nagging old man.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Coach', 3: 'Stop talking and focus on your breathing!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Having finished his rant, the coach grumbles as he checks the stopwatch—and his eyes go wide.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineFocusNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Coach', 3: "You've got to be kidding me...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineFocusNew.prefab'}
{3: 'The coach, who had assumed the boys were just being lazy, is shocked to discover...'}
{3: 'That every single one of them had run faster than they did yesterday based on their pace today in the second-to-last lap.'}
{3: "The reason becomes clear—Yata's sudden burst of speed has thrown off everyone else's rhythm."}
{2: 'Coach', 3: "What a monster... And she doesn't feel tired at all?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Coach', 3: "She's actually running faster now in the boys' group.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Coach', 3: "It's only a matter of time before she becomes a world-class athlete.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Soon after, Yata crosses the finish line where several female members of the track team are waiting for her.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Female Student 1', 3: 'Yata, that final sprint was so cool!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: "Let me catch my breath first, will ya? I know I probably don't look like I get tired but I actually do.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Female Student 1', 3: "Here's some water!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Surrounded by her female admirers, Yata scratches her head sheepishly, clearly unsure how to handle the attention.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Female Student 2', 3: "Yata, you've got to tell us how to run as fast as you do!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Female Student 1', 3: 'I know, right? Do share some tips!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: "Well... I don't really have any special technique, but there are two main points I follow.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Female Student 3', 3: "I knew you had some tricks! Come on, don't hold out on us.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'First, you absolutely need to warm up properly before a race.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Female Student 1', 3: "Everyone knows that already, Yata. Tell us something we don't know!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'Also, make sure you eat before exercising. Running on an empty stomach is a big no-no.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "I'm a big offender of that myself by the way... Just don't do that, yeah?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Female Student 2', 3: "C'mon, Yata, you're just telling us the basic stuff!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Female Student 3', 3: "Right? C'mon, what's your secret?!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'Hey, hey, cut me some slack, will ya?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Seriously, though. These are the only two things I do.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Besides that, it's just training. But then again, everyone here trains.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'If you really want a tip from me...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Female Student 1', 3: 'Oh! Are we finally getting to the good part?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Your mentality is crucial when you're running.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Female Student 2', 3: "Huh? Mentality? What's that supposed to mean...", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Once I get in the zone, I gradually tune out everyone around me and focus only on my own pace.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Truth is, I've always run to surpass myself, not to defeat others.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'When I think this way, my mind becomes as calm as still water.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'As they say, the secret lies in training the mind.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'At these words, the girls fall silent.'}
{3: "Not because they're pondering Yata's athletic philosophy..."}
{3: "They're just bored of Yata's inaccessible experience."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Female Student 2', 3: 'Oh, I see... Well, good job, Yata.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Female Student 3', 3: "Right? I mean, I didn't get it at all, but it sounds impressive, doesn't it?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Their halfhearted responses are punctuated by yawns as they walk away, clearly unimpressed.'}
{3: 'With the girls gone, Yata trudges toward the podium with her usual listless demeanor.'}
{3: "Little does Yata know that the girls aren't the only ones watching her..."}
{3: "Under the shade of an awning, two pairs of eyes closely track Yata's every movement."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "Her physical capabilities are remarkable. She's exceptionally strong.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'A beautiful woman in plain clothes, her age impossible to determine, turns to her attendant with a smile.'}
{3: 'Behind her stands a tall, slender man in an impeccable suit.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kouhei', 3: 'Indeed. Her physical abilities far surpass those of her peers. The "Track Queen of Misono" is what she goes by here, apparently.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'The Track Queen of Misono?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'A fine title, but perhaps her ambitions are too modest?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "If possible, I'd like this child to become Prometheus—one who brings change to humanity.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kouhei', 3: 'Do you consider her an ideal test subject?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'I merely meant that I have high hopes for her and have taken a liking to her.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: "As far as I'm concerned, you shouldn't rush to conclusions just yet. Her physical capabilities are indeed exceptional...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: "But that's not everything that's going to be tested for in the experiments.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: "We've also got to take into consideration her drug sensitivity, neural wave compatibility, recovery capabilities, and so on.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: "These are all crucial factors to consider. It's far too early to draw any conclusions now.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: 'We collected genetic samples from the students under the pretext of medical examinations. The reports will arrive by mail next week.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Is the testing facility reliable?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: 'No need to worry. The laboratory is completely trustworthy.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: "They've conducted numerous genetic tests and screenings for Kurono before.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: "They're highly professional, well-reputed, and strictly protect their clients' confidentiality.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: "However, for security reasons, they don't provide electronic copies of their reports.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: "Results are sent through physical mail to circumvent the Science Council's keyword monitoring system.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "Well, guess that's something to look forward to, then.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: 'We have more pressing matters to deal with right now.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Like what?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: 'As you may recall, the Science Council was extremely wary of us when we first arrived on the island.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: 'Shortly after that, they stationed an ethics committee on the island.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: 'We have to submit regular reports about our research, especially anything involving human subjects.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: "I'm afraid our application for human trials in the consciousness projection experiment won't be approved so easily.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "There's no need to worry, Kouhei.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'As far as I know, the committee chairperson is an old classmate of mine.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "Let's pay them a visit in a bit. I'm sure we can work something out.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kouhei', 3: "It's wonderful that you know them personally. I hope they're as open-minded as you are.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Well... people rarely change, even if the world around them does.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The conversation ends as Kouhei turns around and opens a parasol.'}
{3: 'As Kouhei sees her off with deference, Reika pulls on her black gloves and walks into the shadows.'}
{3: 'Meanwhile, behind the awning...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'Hidden and eavesdropping, Yuka furrows her brows while nervously fidgeting with the bow on her chest.'}
{3: 'She came to look for Yata, only to accidentally overhear the conversation between the two.'}
{3: 'Though she only caught bits and pieces of the conversation, none of which seemed particularly important...'}
{1: '"What were they talking about? And why did they mention Yata?"', 2: 'ffffffff', 3: '60', 4: 'ffffffff', 6: '1'}
{3: '"Well, of course they\'d be talking about Yata. It\'s not like they have any business talking about me anyway..."'}
{1: '"Well, of course they\'d be talking about Yata. It\'s not like they have any business talking about me anyway..."', 2: 'ffffffff', 3: '60', 4: 'ffffffff', 6: '1', 9: '1'}
{3: '"What were they talking about? And why did they mention Yata?"'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1052.jpg'}
{3: 'Just as she bites her lip, a clear, familiar voice rings out from nearby.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'Yuka? Is that you over there?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "Huh? Yeah, it's me.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: "It really is you, Yuka! Why didn't you tell me you were back?", 4: '2'}
{3: "Yata rushes over excitedly, but Yuka's eyes dart away, avoiding direct contact."}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "I heard you were at the field, so I took it upon myself to come to find you... I didn't really think you'd actually be here.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "I'm really sorry for not letting you know beforehand.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'I was worried the whole way here that I might interrupt your training.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Forget about training! I'm just so glad to see you here healthy and well!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'How are you feeling? Are you doing better now?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "Yeah, I'm doing all right. The doctor says I'm better than before.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Would you mind coming with me to the locker room? We could head home together afterward.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Sure, whatever you say.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'As the two of them are about to leave, a student council officer stops them.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Student Council Officer', 3: 'Congratulations, Yuka!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Congratulations... for what?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Student Council Officer', 3: 'Congratulations on becoming this semester\'s "Miss Misono"!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Miss Misono...?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Student Council Officer', 3: "Yes, it means you're the most popular female student at Misono.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Student Council Officer', 3: 'This was decided by a school-wide student vote.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "I never entered this contest. Pretty sure there's some misunderstanding.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Student Council Officer', 3: 'That\'s because a lot of students wrote your name in the "Other" box.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Student Council Officer', 3: 'So the organizing committee specially added you to the list of contestants.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Student Council Officer', 3: 'And you got the highest number of votes! Pretty impressive, right?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "But... I'm not even popular.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Student Council Officer', 3: "You're being too modest, Yuka. You got the highest number of votes.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Please give the award to whoever came in second place.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Student Council Officer', 3: 'Huh? But...', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Yuka turns and leaves without hesitation, leaving Yata and the officer to exchange bewildered looks.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: "Hey, if someone doesn't want the award, you shouldn't force it on them.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Student Council Officer', 3: 'You must be... Yata, the prodigy from the track and field club, right?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Student Council Officer', 3: "Please, you must help me convince Yuka. I'm begging you!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "That's asking way too much. If she doesn't want it, there's nothing we can do about it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "How about giving it to me instead? I don't mind.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Student Council Officer', 3: "Well, I'm afraid that's gonna be a little difficult...", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Before the Student Council Officer can finish speaking, Yata turns and hurries after Yuka.'}
{3: 'When she catches up to Yuka, she finds her with furrowed brows and a dejected look on her face.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'Yuka, wait up! Why did you leave without saying anything?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "You could have just said no if it really isn't your cup of tea. There's no need to get upset about it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "No, that's not it... I just don't understand why everyone likes me.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "I'm supposed to be a good student and study hard here at Misono...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "And I'm sure I'd disappoint the Doctor if I get distracted and do things that aren't academic.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'By "Doctor", I\'m guessing you mean Dr. Saotome?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Yes, my guardian.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Why are you still calling her your "guardian", though...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "I just don't think I'm good enough to be her daughter yet... I don't think I'm ready.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'As her adopted child, I feel guilty for not becoming the person she hoped I would be.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Dr. Saotome spent so much money trying to get me treated, but here I am, still as useless as ever.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "If her rivals ever find out she's caring for a burden like me...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "I'm sure people would make a laughing stock out of her, and I'd hate to see that.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "That's ridiculous! Don't you think you worry a little too much when she's just your guardian?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Just be yourself. That's all that matters!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "What's wrong? Is she strict with you?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "No, she isn't... Dr. Saotome... was clumsy but very gentle when we first met.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'But then... she started working on some challenging research, and she barely came home anymore.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "She's busy with her work... but I guess that's not something she can do anything about.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "...Doesn't this kind of relationship make you sad?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "I... No, not at all. I don't think there's anything wrong with it.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "I guess I'm sticking my nose where it doesn't belong.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1053.jpg'}
{3: 'The conversation trails off into silence as they walk quietly into the school building.'}
{3: 'As Yata removes her sneakers, Yuka opens her shoe locker—untouched for the past month and a half.'}
{3: 'A cloud of dust rises as a cascade of white envelopes tumbles out of her locker.'}
{3: "Love letters rain down one after another, pattering against Yuka's face."}
{3: 'As Yuka crouches down to gather the letters, Yata watches with flushed cheeks.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: "What are those... Love letters? I'm so jealous, I've never gotten a single one before.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Guys are such idiots!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Why... would they stuff them in a place like this?', 4: '2'}
{3: "Yuka mutters under her breath so Yata can't hear what she says."}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'By the way, we should start getting gifts for the graduates soon.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Are we supposed to give them the gifts in person at the graduation ceremony?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Yes, and it's Misono tradition that the gifts are handmade.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "You're the star of the handicrafts club, right, Yuka? Let's do this together.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "Sure, let's do it.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'What should we make, though?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Hmm, good question...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Oh, what about a music box?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'A music box? Sounds like a plan!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Is it complicated, though, mechanically speaking?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "It shouldn't be too difficult as long as we have all the materials ready.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'All right, a music box it is, then.', 4: '1'}
